thread.title: In-form Jeffrey Schlupp set to start at left in the absence of Baba Rahman in Ghana's friendly
thread.title_full: In-form Jeffrey Schlupp set to start at left in the absence of Baba Rahman in Ghana's friendly

title: In-form Jeffrey Schlupp set to start at left in the absence of Baba Rahman in Ghana's friendly
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 00:55 CET In-form Jeffrey Schlupp set to start at left in the absence of Baba Rahman in Ghana's friendly - www.ghanasoccernet.com Jeffrey Schlupp 
Leicester City's utility player Jeffrey Schlupp is set to start as left-back for Ghana in Tuesday's friendly against Canada after Baba Rahman failed to make the trip to Washington,DC. 
Schlupp,22, has started the season in swashbuckling form and has a goal and an assist to his credit in 8 league games. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us Newton discovered the law of gravity but the Apostle Paul discovered the law of sin and death By: Bismark Omari Somuah
